entry.title: Contradiction in BIP65 text?
entry.summary: In an email exchange on November 13, 2015 at 9:53:57 PM, Gregory Maxwell requested clarification regarding nlocktime without BIP65. The purpose of this explanation was to provide context for the need of BIP65. Maxwell recommended changing the wording of BIP65 to make this connection clearer. The email included a digital signature attachment.
